results.title: A Summer's tale = Conte d'ete
results.creator_credit: Eric Rohmer, Margaret Menegoz, Canal+, Sofilmka, La Sept Cinema and Les Films du Losange
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Tales of the four seasons = Contes des quatre saisons”.
Gaspard (Melvil Poupard), a musically inclined maths graduate with time to kill is waiting for his girlfriend, Lena, in the resort town of Dinard, unbeknownst that his stable and uneventful life is about to be turned on it head when he becomes torn between his affections for three women. He whiles away the lazy afternoon hours with Margot (Amanda Langlet), a part time student and pancake house worker, and most importantly - a good listener. Margot wants a purely platonic relationship with Gaspard as she already has a boyfriend. Enter likely candidate number three, Margot’s friend Solene (Gwenaelle Simon), whom Gaspard becomes instantly smitten with and agrees to spend a weekend with on the island of Ouessant. When Lena finally arrives on the island Gaspard must finally make a choice between three women who are all offering him something different in the relationship stakes. In French with English subtitles. This film, the third in Rohmer’s “4 Season cycle” finds the director in fine story telling form.

results.title: Talking of safety
results.creator_credit: Ron Tanner, David Evans and Millbank Films
results.brief_description: Deals with the effectiveness of safety committee meetings. Shows how a newly-appointed safety supervisor at a brick and tile manufacturing plant in England makes his committee work more effectively while promoting clearly defined objectives.

results.title: Autumn tale = Conte d'Automne
results.creator_credit: Eric Rohmer, Margaret Menegoz, Sofilmka, Rhone-Alpes Cinema, La Sept Cinema and Canal+
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Tales of the four seasons = Contes des quatre saisons”.
The final instalment in Eric Rohmer’s “Tales of the four seasons” quartet of films looks at a later life romance. Friends and family of the widowed Magali decide that it is time she was matched up with a new lover. Beautifully filmed in the vineyards of the Rhone Valley. In French with English subtitles.

results.title: Tape
results.creator_credit: Richard Linklater, Alexis Alexanian, Gary Winick, Anne Walker-McBay, Independent Film Channel and InDigEnt (US)
results.brief_description: Set in a dull Michigan motel room, based on a one-act play, comes Richard Linklater’s “Tape” shot digitally and edited using Final Cut software. Two high school friends Vince (Ethan Hawke) and John (Robert Sean-Leonard) re-unite as twenty-something adults to reminisce. Memory and real events are questioned with the arrival of Amy (Uma Thurman) who claims she was date-raped by both of them. Tense and gripping with wonderful performances from the three leads. Based on the stage play by Stephen Belber.

results.title: Tales from two schools
results.brief_description: Work created by students from Tarnagulla and Marong primary schools with animator Paul Fletcher as part of the Artists in Schools Project sponsored by the Department of Education and Arts Victoria. Contains original artwork by the students (from lower primary levels) that has been animated by the artist, footage of the students and animations created by the older students. Storyline is minimal but includes a flying potato adventure, a monster circus and experimental animation.

results.title: Tank girl
results.creator_credit: Rachel Talalay, John Watson, Pen Densham, Richard Lewis, Trilogy Entertainment Group and United Artists Corporation
results.brief_description: The year is 2033 and water is a precious commodity. In the desolate wind swept plains, animals are banned, bathing is unheard of, and the Water & Power Company, headed by the villainous Kesslee (Malcolm McDowell), have ultimate control over the precious H20. One rebel girl stands in their way, Rebecca (Lori Petty), a chick with attitude and an outrageous hairstyle. She is captured by Water & Power when they kill her boyfriend, kidnap her young friend, and try to blackmail her into joining their team. As a prisoner Rebecca discovers a new passion- tanks, and makes a friend with mechanic and pilot, Jet Girl (Naomi Watts), who helps her escape. Once free the girls join forces with The Rippers, an army of half men and half kangaroos, genetically modified to be the ultimate fighting machines. Together they take Water & Power head on, lead by Jet Girl in the sky, and tank girl on the ground with her beloved tank in a flurry of live action and comic strip visuals. Cast also includes Ice-T, Don Harvey and Jeff Kober.

results.title: Tapdancin'
results.brief_description: Tap Dancin’ explores the survivors and revivers of the great days of tap dance through performance, interviews and vintage footage which includes the Hoofers, the Copasetics and Bill “Bojangles” Robinson.
